content: *this lacy spa crochet headband with elastic stretches to fit snugly around your head and is perfect to keep your hair back when doing home spa procedures you ll want to make them in all different colors * > this pattern is part of the advent > calendar mystery crochet along 2023 to > make last minute crochet gifts for > your loved ones or yourself this is > only 1 of the 30 patterns in the > advent calendar mystery crochet along > but only 24 of them will be made > available for free on nicki s homemade > crafts with ads > and the only way to get all 30 > patterns ad-free and printer-friendly > is in the **ebook** the **ebook** > will be on sale until december 24th > 2023 **the code 5advent will save you $5 between december 1st and 24th > 2023 ** then the price will go back > up to the regular price so take > advantage if you want to get all the > patterns even ad-free and > printer-friendly >**get the ebook here 1 ** pattern is free with ads on my website here 2 > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 400 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership here 3 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-gifts-made-easy-vol2/ ref=dec23pattern 2 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/spa-crochet-headband-elastic/ 3 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/
